attributes.action: Request a special investigation by the FSA and OFT into the harrassment by consumers and their families through the debt collection practices of MBNA and specifically the practices related to telephone calls and defaults while in dispute
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is for individuals that have suffered harrassing phone calls from MBNA customer services. Calls to relatives numbers and if you have been defaulted by MBNA while you have disputed your account or while waiting for documents covered OFT publication on Post Contract Information requirements July 2008
